GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves an object of the queried review

review.title: One Night Ultimate Werewolf
review.review_body: Fiddly fun for all the family

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user object for the queried username

Patch /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves an object of the queried and updated review

review.title: One Night Ultimate Werewolf
review.review_body: Fiddly fun for all the family

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments objects of the queried review

comments.author: happyamy2016
comments.body: Fiddly fun for all the family

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves posted comment object for the queried review

comment.author: happyamy2016
comment.body: Fiddly fun for all the family

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the queried comment and returns 204 status with no content
